versions.summary: Archive search with direct article navigation
versions.description: Search across all saved diffs by article heading, body, or category. Click a matching article to jump directly to it in the diff, highlighted and scrolled into view. Results ranked by match quality — full word, start-of-word, then substring.

changes.text: Full-text search across archived diffs with highlighted results
Click a search match to navigate directly to that article in the diff
Search results ranked by match quality with multi-term scoring
Article scroll targets now align correctly with rendered diff positions

versions.summary: Quick share codes for profile import
versions.description: Share profiles with a short temporary code instead of a full UUID. Generate a code like diff-ab3k, share it verbally or via text, and the recipient enters it to import — no QR scanner or copy-paste needed.

changes.text: Password-confirmed dialog for removing synced profiles from the server
Upload to server link on local profiles in the setup wizard
Sync now works after password is changed on another device

versions.description: Connect from your terminal with the new diff·log CLI. The about page now includes install instructions and a one-line setup script.

changes.text: CLI authentication endpoint for secure browser-based login
One-line install script and CLI section on the about page
API keys synced from older versions now load correctly

versions.description: All API keys now sync across devices with end-to-end encryption. Set up your providers once and have them available everywhere.

changes.text: All API keys (Anthropic, DeepSeek, Gemini, Perplexity, Serper) now sync with encryption
Orphaned stars from deleted diffs are now automatically cleaned up

versions.description: Full rewrite in SvelteKit. Multi-provider support for mixing AI backends across search, curation, and synthesis stages.

changes.text: Multi-provider support — use Anthropic, DeepSeek, Gemini, Perplexity, or Serper for each generation stage
Background generation with resume-from-failure and stage caching
Deep-link paragraph sharing on public diffs with persistent highlight
Keyboard-accessible starring with visible focus indicators
New users land directly on the generate page for a smoother first experience
Upgraded Gemini models to 2.5 Flash
HTML entities no longer appear in Gemini-generated diffs
Profile switching during generation no longer causes data corruption
Sync encryption salt now stays in sync with the server, fixing decrypt failures after cross-device password changes
Diff title now reflects the overall theme instead of repeating the first section heading

versions.description: Track your diff·log usage with a new streak system. See your weekly activity at a glance and build consistency in staying up to date.

changes.text: Streak tracking with weekly activity calendar
Ctrl+click demo profile creation on setup
Star hashing and Alpine.js key generation
Streak calendar shows full history from first diff
Markdown links with nested brackets like [pdf] now render correctly
Public share page shows title as main heading, removes redundant date
Dynamic token limits based on depth setting prevent truncated responses

versions.summary: Share your diffs with the world
versions.description: Make any diff public with a single click. Share your personalized tech briefings with colleagues or on social media.

changes.text: Public diff sharing with shareable links
API cost tracking for each diff
Selective sync to reduce bandwidth
Share button visibility with ad blockers

versions.description: AI now curates your feeds for relevance, searches the web for breaking news, and you can set up browser notifications to never miss a diff.

changes.text: AI-powered feed curation for relevance
Web search for breaking news and updates
Browser notification reminders
Random wait tips while generating

versions.description: Sync your profiles and diffs across devices with end-to-end encryption. Plus, silky smooth page transitions.

changes.text: Cloud sync with password-protected encryption
CSS View Transitions for smooth navigation
Improved profile import and management
Mobile header layout improvements

versions.description: Your personalized developer intelligence diff. Set up a profile with your tech stack, interests, and depth preference, then generate daily briefings powered by Claude.

changes.text: Profile-based personalization
Multi-source feeds (HN, Reddit, GitHub, Lobsters, Dev.to)
Star and archive your favorite insights
Dark theme with accent color
